doc:
Ernie Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernie_Anderson 0 Ernest Earle Anderson (November 12, 1923 – February 6, 1997) was an American radio and television personality, horror host, and announcer. Best known for his portrayal of "Ghoulardi," the host of a late night horror films on WJW Channel 8 on Cleveland television from 1963 to 1966, he also worked as an announcer for the American Broadcasting Company (ABC) television network from the late 1970s until the mid-1990s. He was the father of filmmaker Paul Thomas Anderson. Ernest_Earle_Anderson ( November_12_,_1923 – February_6_,_1997 ) was an_American_radio_and_television_personality , horror_host , and announcer . Best known for his_portrayal of " Ghoulardi , " the_host of a_late_night_horror_films on WJW_Channel_8 on Cleveland_television from 1963 to 1966 , he also worked as an_announcer for the_American_Broadcasting_Company_(_ABC_)_television_network from the_late_1970s until the_mid-1990s . He was the_father of filmmaker_Paul_Thomas_Anderson .
